mapper.insert:
insert into base_bank (id,provide_code, bank_code, bank_name, account_name, account_no ,account_type,bank_detail, remark , status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{listDO.id}, #{listDO.provideCode},#{listDO.bankCode}, #{listDO.bankName}, #{listDO.accountName}, #{listDO.accountNo} , #{listDO.accountType},#{listDO.bankDetail},#{listDO.remark} , #{listDO.status}, #{listDO.createBy}, #{listDO.createTime}, #{listDO.updateBy}, #{listDO.updateTime})

insert into base_supplier_receip (supplier_code,company_title,dutynum,bill_info ,acc_num,phone,address,status , create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{listDO.supplierCode},#{listDO.companyTitle},#{listDO.dutynum},#{listDO.billInfo} ,#{listDO.accNum},#{listDO.phone},#{listDO.address},#{listDO.status} , #{listDO.createBy}, #{listDO.createTime}, #{listDO.updateBy}, #{listDO.updateTime})

insert into base_supplier_outlets (servcom_no,website_code,websitec_type,websitec_name,remark, status,create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{listDO.servcomNo},#{listDO.websiteCode},#{listDO.websitecType},#{listDO.websitecName},#{listDO.remark}, #{listDO.status}, #{listDO.createBy}, #{listDO.createTime}, #{listDO.updateBy}, #{listDO.updateTime})
